Reviews.Title: LOVE IT!
Reviews.Author: Nora Bardakjian
Reviews.Content: I had this phone for over 3 years and it worked like it was brand new! It's a great phone for someone who does not want to use a smartphone. It's very reliable and never gave me any problems. I miss this phone so much! Definitely on my top 5 list! looooooooove it :)

Reviews.Title: AMAZING PHONE
Reviews.Author: Kevork Bardakjian
Reviews.Content: This phone is great! Very durable and easy to use! One of my favorites! It's a phone that you can use all the time and still have full battery life. It plays music, takes pictures, easy texting and best of all it has NEVER given any problems.

Reviews.Title: Not a good product
Reviews.Author: shaq
Reviews.Content: Even though this product arrived on time it does not operate at all, it just turns on and shuts right off, very disappointing

ProductInfo.Features:
This product has been carefully audited and is certified to be 100% functional.
This offer includes the following accessories 1. Battery 2. Battery Cover (if applicable) 3. Wall Charger
ProductInfo.Name: Sony Ericsson Z750 Gray No Contract AT&T Cell Phone
